snippet: Mark Reynolds hit two homers as Baltimore defeated Josh Beckett to improve to 7-3 against Boston this season.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles defeat Boston Red Sox, 7-1; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Mark Reynolds hit two homers as Baltimore defeated Josh Beckett to improve to 7-3 against Boston this season.

headline.seo: Orioles Pound Beckett and Struggling Red Sox
headline.main: For Red Sox, Meetings Don’t Stop the Losing
headline.print_headline: For Red Sox, Meetings Don’t Stop the Losing
